dataset_name.description: The name of the dataset to be used.

patience.description: The number of epochs after the training should be stopped if the validation loss is not decreasing.

valid_size.description: Percentage of the size of the validation set.

seed.description: Controls the way to generate random values. If set to True, the same values will be generated in every execution.

hidden_neurons.description: Number of hidden nodes in the hidden layers.
